locations.name: The Fremont Troll
locations.narrative_snippet: Your hunt begins beneath the Aurora Bridge. Head to the coordinates above to find where a concrete giant clutches a Volkswagen Beetle in its grip.
locations.location_found_text: You've found it! The massive Fremont Troll looms above you, a quirky guardian of the underpass. Look carefully at the details carved into the concrete around you.

puzzle.prompt: Find the four-digit year carved nearby on the concrete. Add the digits together and multiply the result by 3. Enter the result as a 2-digit number (zero-pad if needed).

locations.puzzle_success_text: Well done! The troll's secrets are revealed. Now follow the next clue to continue your journey through Fremont's hidden corners.
locations.next_riddle: A legendary traveler from another era stands where the crossroads meet — find the controversial bronze with a raised arm.

locations.name: Lenin Statue
locations.location_found_text: You've arrived! Before you stands a towering bronze figure, transplanted from across the world. This statue has quite a story — read the plaque nearby to learn more.

puzzle.prompt: On the informational plaque nearby, find the six-letter word that refers to the statue's country of origin. Enter it in all caps (6 letters).

locations.puzzle_success_text: Correct! This statue traveled far from its homeland. Your next destination awaits — a place where stories are bought and sold.
locations.next_riddle: Books stacked to the ceiling, a hanging wooden sign and the faint watch of a window cat will guide you.

locations.name: Ophelia's Books
locations.location_found_text: Welcome to a reader's sanctuary! This cozy bookshop has been a Fremont fixture for years. Take a moment to appreciate the carefully curated shelves before solving the puzzle.

puzzle.prompt: Look at the wooden sign — enter the second word, exactly as written, 4 letters.

locations.puzzle_success_text: Excellent! The bookshop has shared its secret. Your final destination is one of Seattle's most iconic parks — head toward the water.
locations.next_riddle: Head toward the skyline and the water — a park made from industrial bones keeps time with the sun.

locations.name: Gas Works Park - Sundial
locations.location_found_text: You've reached the final stop! Gas Works Park transforms industrial history into public space. Climb the hill to find the sundial — a perfect ending point with sweeping views of the city.

puzzle.prompt: At the sundial, note the three highest engraved hour numbers. Add them together and enter the result (3 digits, zero-pad if needed).

locations.puzzle_success_text: Congratulations! You've completed the Fremont Hidden Corners hunt. Take a moment to enjoy the view — you've earned it!
